mapper.sql: id, role_name as roleName, role_code as roleCode, description, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, is_deleted as isDeleted, company
mapper.select:
select from t_role t
and t.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
and t.is_deleted = 0 and exists (select 1 from t_user u where u.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = t.company)
